About Me

"If there's a will there's a way," my father taught me that when I was six. I apply that to everything I attempt; it makes me notoriously determined to complete the tasks I set out to do.

Projects

veryFitness

An application based around creating new workout routines in order to improve mental and physical fitness. With this app, you can select your preferred workout strategy and exercises to fit your needs. By keeping track of previous exercises and showing workout tutorials, you can improve your techniques, build muscle, and increase overall energy levels!

Umbrella Build

Website built in order to market Umbrella Contracting, related services, and show off previous work. To engage potential customers, this site was created with the intention of providing a way for the company's contracting services to be requested easily.

Pollmaster

This app provides a method for groups to make decisions using anonymous polls. By creating an account, you are able to create and share polls with your friends or company in order to provide a discrete method to come up with a decision quickly. This program can separate polls based on urgency and prevent access from people wishing to skew results.

dropOff

This travel application tailored to university students, provides an environmentally and economically friendly way for students to commute. By allowing users to filter their searches by price and location, it allows students to find rides more efficiently and drivers to fill up their cars. It holds users accountable for failing to uphold transactions and ensures the availability of seats in the rides.
